text: I don't spend much money on clothes I never did.
author: Lauren Hutton

text: Sooner or later, we sell out for money.
author: Tony Randall

text: If American men are obsessed with money, American women are obsessed with weight. The men talk of gain, the women talk of loss, and I do not know which talk is the more boring.
author: Marya Mannes

text: I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough.
author: Sergei Bubka

text: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.
author: Arthur Rock
